Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute at Inner Lake Shore Drive/Division
ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan buses are temp. rerouted via LaSalle Dr, Outer Lake Shore Dr, and exit at Oak to Michigan at Inner Lake Shore Drive/Division.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via LaSalle Dr, Outer Lake Shore Dr, and exit at Oak to Michigan,  due to street blockage near Inner Lake Shore Drive/Division.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #76 Diversey Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Diversey/Laramie-LeClaire
ShortDescription: Eastbound 76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Division,Laramie, Fullerton, Cicero, and Diversey near Diversey/Laramie-LeClaire.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Division,Laramie, Fullerton, Cicero, and Diversey near Diversey/Laramie-LeClaire.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
